column1: Little Goat Diner////I love the atmosphere in the diner...homestyle chic.  Comfy modern vintage vibe
column2: in line with the other establishments in the W Loop.  Ample room in our booth (near the front of the restaurant
column4: corner wall windows let plenty of natural light in
column5: I like that the kitchen and line are in view.  Community tables had ample space too...and the noise level all around was contained.
